divs: sighting detailson 5\7\13 around 9:00 i was outside looking for ufos and using a high powerd laser beam shooting it into the sky at first there were several starlike orbs flying around the sky then off to the left of me a huge glowing craft made of light appeared . flowing about 20 ft off the ground it hoverd the then slowly desenended to the ground. i onlyhad a phone to record with and it somehow got turned on to stencil mode but i still maneged to film it. i then ran into my friends house to tell him and his girlfriend to come look when we got back outside it. became so bright it looked like a little sun! it was so bright and begain eminting some auar of light in a pyramidal shape around it. i wasnt going to let this chance of a lifetime get away so i started walking, strait for it in the total darkness my friends became worried and yelled for me to come back. they,were rhly afard so i came back. i told them to go inside and once more i headed for the craft . then i watched it, totaly disapiar. then on the mountain behind us to buge red ords of light lit up and started flying right towars me as they got over head i sbot the laser at tbem and they bothe vrew extreamly bright then disapired
